questions_1.question: The gang drain
Options: Terminates to the atmosphere at the drain mast through the lower door of the core cowl
Terminates to the atmosphere through an opening in the exhaust nozzle fairing
Terminates to the atmosphere at the drain mast through the drain fittings
Terminates to the atmosphere through an opening in the drain nozzles
